thread.title: Gerritsen plays ‘with Fire’ at Owl & Turtle
thread.title_full: Gerritsen plays ‘with Fire’ at Owl & Turtle

author: news@courierpublicationsllc.com (Staff)
title: Gerritsen plays ‘with Fire’ at Owl & Turtle
text:
Gerritsen plays ‘with Fire’ at Owl & Turtle Oct 15, 2015 Photo by: Jacob Gerritsen Tess Gerritsen 
Camden — Internationally bestselling author and Camden resident Tess Gerritsen will debut her latest work, “Playing with Fire,” Tuesday, Oct. 27, at 6 p.m. at the Owl & Turtle Bookshop Café, 33 Bay View St. 
A standalone crime thriller, “Playing with Fire” ventures away from the medical and into the musical. When Julia, a young violinist, first picks up some mysterious sheet music in an Italian antique shop, she has no concept of the dark and twisted journey ahead. Musical references and lingo abound in this intriguing thriller by the author of the Rizzoli & Isles series. Gerritsen delivers a novel full of the emotional and psychological suspense that has become her hallmark, combined with a haunting musical leitmotif throughout its pages. 
“Playing with Fire” and other titles by the author will be available for purchase and signing. For more information, call 230-7335 or email info@owlandturtle.com. 
Courier Publications’ A&E Editor Dagney C. Ernest can be reached at (207) 594-4401, ext. 115; or dernest@courierpublicationsllc.com.
